metadata.title: CVE-2023-40857 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in VirusTotal yara v.4.3.2 allows a remoteattacker to execute arbtirary code via the yr_execute_cod function in theexe.c component.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
